name: Antelope Island State Park
description: Explore wildlife, beaches, and hiking trails with great views of the Great Salt Lake.

name: Syracuse Museum
description: Local history museum with pioneer artifacts and community exhibits.

name: Jensen Nature Park
description: Enjoy walking trails, a pond, and beautiful wildlife in this family-friendly park.

name: Great Salt Lake Shorelands Preserve
description: Thousands of acres of wetlands provide a habitat for numerous migratory birds..

name: Erie Canal Museum
description: Perfect for sports and outdoor play, with open spaces and picnic areas.

name: The Rush Funplex
description: Indoor amusement center with go karts, bowling, rock climbing, laser tag, skating, mini golf, and a foam pit.

name: Glen Eagle Golf Course
description: Well-maintained links golf course featuring an island green on the 18th hole, and mountain views.

name: Legacy Park
description: Park with a gazebo, picnic areas, and a pond, plus a playground.
